Sentencas: This paper presents the design, energy management and economic analysis of an off-grid power plant for a strip mall.
Titulo: Off-grid PV/URFC power plant fueled with biogas from food waste: An energetic and economic analysis

Sentencas: The main goal is to achieve a 100% renewable operation, by using a photovoltaic panel array coupled to a battery and a unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell fed both with self-generated hydrogen and biogas produced from food waste in an on-site anaerobic digester.
Titulo: Off-grid PV/URFC power plant fueled with biogas from food waste: An energetic and economic analysis

Sentencas: The power plant has been modeled by means of a self-made Matlab/Simulink (R) simulator and the plant operation has been simulated against different radiation and load demand scenarios.
Titulo: Off-grid PV/URFC power plant fueled with biogas from food waste: An energetic and economic analysis

Sentencas: Results are compared both in terms of energetic and economic performance.
Titulo: Off-grid PV/URFC power plant fueled with biogas from food waste: An energetic and economic analysis

Sentencas: In particular, it is observed that the annualized capital costs for unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell cover from 50% up to 58% of the total investment cost and from 71% up to 75% of the total replacement costs.
Titulo: Off-grid PV/URFC power plant fueled with biogas from food waste: An energetic and economic analysis

Sentencas: Depending on the scenario and the specific tipping fee, tipping costs vary from a minimum of 9,793 $/y to a maximum 47,335 $/y.
Titulo: Off-grid PV/URFC power plant fueled with biogas from food waste: An energetic and economic analysis

Sentencas: For all the analyzed scenarios, the cost of energy is higher than the grid electricity price, but the 100% renewable operation of the plant and the on-site waste conversion to biogas make this solution worth of investigation.
Titulo: Off-grid PV/URFC power plant fueled with biogas from food waste: An energetic and economic analysis
